subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Danilo Gallinari scored 22 points, Kenyon Martin scored 6 of his 18 in the final 3:24, and the Nuggets extended their winning streak to six.
snippet: Danilo Gallinari scored 22 points, Kenyon Martin scored 6 of his 18 in the final 3:24, and the Nuggets extended their winning streak to six.
